name: Jelly Boom HD
description:
The BEST FREE MATCH 3 GAME! Match cute jellies to achieve goal!

Exciting features:
# A new special jelly for each level.
# Awesome match-3 reaction chain.
# Tons of FREE boosters help you win.
# Boss level makes the game more challenging.
# Daily login bonus.
# Facebook login is supported.
# More than 400 levels. Even more new levels are coming every two weeks!

Download the best social match 3 game now! Compete with your friends in real time. You'll have lots of fun!

If you have any suggestion/comment/problem, please mailto: support@droidhen.com.
